TopicTitle: [1.1] MakeItSmall 1.2 - Because sometime you need stuff to be smaller

Articles.Content:
The 1.1 pre release is here and some complain about the size of the NavBall and the limit of the UI slider. So here is a simple solution to make part of the UI larger or smaller and set the whole UI scale without limit.

MakeItSmall let your resize the NavBall, Crew, Timer and Altimeter. 

Open the UI while in the Flight scene with ALT U. 

v1.1 With the amazing feature of actually saving all the config !

Download :  MakeItSmall-1.2.0.0.zip

License : MIT

Source : https://github.com/sarbian/MakeItSmall
